metadata.credibility_scoring: Multi-prompt LLM evaluation with Opik tracking

incidents.title: Severe Flooding - Times Square Area
incidents.description: Heavy rainfall causing street flooding, water levels rising rapidly. Multiple reports from pedestrians and traffic cameras.
incidents.source: NOAA Weather Service + Tavily News Aggregation

incidents.title: Road Closure - Lower Manhattan
incidents.description: Emergency construction due to water main break. Traffic rerouted.

incidents.title: Debris on Roadway - Williamsburg Bridge
incidents.description: Large debris reported blocking right lane. Police responding.

incidents.title: Multi-Vehicle Accident - FDR Drive
incidents.description: 3-car collision reported, emergency services on scene. Expect delays.

incidents.title: Gas Leak - Morningside Heights
incidents.description: Emergency gas leak reported. Building evacuated, area cordoned off.
